caption.p: Colloidal Superparticles Self-Assembled from Different NPs
(A–E) (A) BaCrO 4, (B) Ag 2Se, (C) PbS, (D) ZrO 2, (E) NaYF 4. Reproduced with permission from Bai et al. ( Bai et al., 2007). Copyright 2007 John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
(F) TiO 2. Reproduced with permission from Lu et al., 2010. Copyright 2010 John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
(G) CoFe 2O 4. Reproduced with permission from Nijs et al. ( de Nijs et al., 2015). Copyright 2015 Macmillan Publishers Ltd.
(H) Fe 3O 4 nanocubes. Reproduced with permission from Wang et al. ( Wang et al., 2018a). Copyright 2018 Macmillan Publishers Ltd.
